stanza.line: Can my love excuse the slow offenceoffence
Of my dull bearer when from thee I speedspeed
From where thou art why should I haste me thencethence
Till I return of posting is no needneed
O what excuse will my poor beast then findfind
When swift extremity can seem but slowslow
Then should I spur though mounted on the windwind
In winged speed no motion shall I knowknow
Then can no horse with my desire keep pacepace
Therefore desire (of perfect love being made)made)
Shall neigh (no dull flesh) in his fiery racerace
But love for love thus shall excuse my jadejade
Since from thee going he went wilful-slowwilful-slow
Towards thee Ill run and give him leave to gogo
